BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.oracle.visitor.statement.impl.OracleDDLStatementSQLVisitor.visitAlterTable(OracleStatementParser$AlterTableContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.oracle.visitor.statement.impl.OracleDDLStatementSQLVisitor.visitCreateTable(OracleStatementParser$CreateTableContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.oracle.visitor.statement.impl.OracleDMLStatementSQLVisitor.extractValueFromGroupByItemExpression(OracleStatementParser$ExprContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.oracle.visitor.statement.impl.OracleDMLStatementSQLVisitor.createInsertValuesSegments(OracleStatementParser$AssignmentValuesContext): 1st parameter 'ctx' could be declared as org.antlr.v4.runtime.tree.ParseTree instead

org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.oracle.visitor.statement.impl.OracleDMLStatementSQLVisitor.extractColumnValuesFromSingleColumnForLoop(List): 1st parameter 'ctx' could be declared as java.lang.Iterable instead

org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.oracle.visitor.statement.impl.OracleDMLStatementSQLVisitor.extractSelectSubqueryValuesFromSingleColumnForLoop(List): 1st parameter 'ctx' could be declared as java.lang.Iterable instead

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.oracle.visitor.statement.impl.OracleDMLStatementSQLVisitor.visitQueryTableExpr(OracleStatementParser$QueryTableExprContext) manually casts the right hand side of an assignment more specifically than needed

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.oracle.visitor.statement.impl.OracleDMLStatementSQLVisitor.visitJoinClause(OracleStatementParser$JoinClauseContext) stores return result in local before immediately returning it

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.oracle.visitor.statement.impl.OracleStatementSQLVisitor.visitCastFunction(OracleStatementParser$CastFunctionContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
